com.lcsc.hackathon.kinectcontroller.controller

Class Gesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lcsc.hackathon.kinectcontroller.controller.Gesture

  • public class Gesture
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jake on 6/2/2015. A Gesture is basically just a place to put information about the gestures that were loaded into Esper. The Esper listener classes are going to have to be using these to determine what key was pressed, which joint is being tracked for the mouse and stuff like that.

      • getEsperQuery

        public java.lang.String getEsperQuery()
        This will bundle up all of the separate _ruleQueries pieces for Esper.
        Returns:
        Some sort of sql query for Esper that has the gestureId of this Gesture so the Listener can look up this Gesture's emulation.
